posts.post_content:
I'm working on a t206 HOFer back run. Below is a list of what I still need.  The plan is to "bump" this thread each time I add a new back with a HOFer.

I can't afford mid to high grade HOFers with tough backs, so probably nothing higher than a 3 depending on the HOFer.  I'm going to be selling a few HOFers to help fund these cards (so look for those posts coming later today) or I can use some of them for trade bait.  I don't have much in the way of rare stuff to trade, but I do have a nice selection of lots of brands from 1909 to about 1935 and newer depending if you are interested. 

WHAT HOF BACK I NEED:
AB 350 (Frame)
AB 350 (No Frame)
AB 460 - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Blank Back
Broad Leaf 350
Broad Leaf 460
Carolina Brights
Drum
EPDG - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Hindu Brown
Hindu Red
Lenox Brown
Old Mill Black SL
Old Mill Brown SL
P150
Piedy 42
Polar Bear - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Sovereign 150
Sovereign 350 Forest Green
Sovereign 350 Apple Green
Sovereign 460 - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
SC150 #649
SC350 #25
SC350-460 #25 - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
SC350-460 #30 - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
SC350-460 #42
SC350-460 #42 (overprint) - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Tolstoi - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Uzit - Need ONLY McGraw Portrait w/ Cap
Ty Cobb (LOL yeah right!)  :)

Let me know what you have!  Thanks!

Jimi

I adjusted this thread a little tonight to list what I still need of each HOFer.  I'm working on HOF t206s with one HOFer per back.  I'm working on a McGraw Portrait w/ Cap back run and filling in the gaps with other HOFers on the backs that do not coincide with the McGraws that I need.  

I have lots to trade, and I would welcome the possibility of unloading some of my "Top Ten" cards in order to get what I need including my '51B Mantle RC, e106 Collins, n172 Comiskey, e95 Plank, V61 Cobb, w511 Ruth, and others especially if I can get some tougher backs along the way.

LMK!  
Jimi
Just picked up the OM McGraw.  Still need the rest.  Thanks!
